attributes.action: allow free reporting of all family court cases - before, during and after the hearings - and to uphold the decision made in Clayton v. Clayton, as this is fundamental to human rights, justice and the liberty of children and their families.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of children are removed from their homes every year by secret courts responding to fearful reports created by anonymous "experts", partly in response to local authority targets which have created a sinister adoption market particularly for young babies. The only way to halt the cruelty and cowardice of such a system - which picks on young mothers and children in the name of "care" and "protection" - is to let the public judge the judges.
